TopicTitle: Vernor engines and RCS build aid

Articles.Content:
Hello

There's no menu for Vernor engines in SPH or VBA to cut them or switch them on in order to be able to use RCS build aid to reduce torque on attitude and translation.

With Ferram, vernor engines can be used for stability purpose at high mach and also for docking.

This won't be the same engines working for attitude and for translation, so it would be great to have menu under SPH or VBA enabling to cut vernor we want to cut so as to study with RCS build aid.
I don't use RCS build aid. You might have more luck in the RCS build aid, or mod support forums.
For anyone else that sees this post and might use this mod, gilflo was directed here by another user.

Last time I checked it worked with Vernor engines. Make sure you are in the correct mode (Translation or rotation) and have "RCS" selected. If that doesn't work, try "Engines", but it should work with the normal RCS setting.

No, there isn't. Set up your conventional RCS first, then add the Vernors. And set an action group to toggle the Vernors off during docking.
